member.name: M:Rainbow.Content.Web.ModulesHtmlModule.Page_Load(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: The Page_Load event handler on this User Control is used to render a block of HTML or text to the page. The text/HTML to render is stored in the HtmlText database table. This method uses the Rainbow.HtmlTextDB() data component to encapsulate all data functionality.
